content: Synchronization will allow to upload all the data from the portal and update the new data after changing the settings. Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the functionality of the "Synchronize" toggle button on Portal Settings pages, indicating that it enables syncing portal data with LDAP settings. The text appears in an unavailable state (indicated by a specific class name) and is translated as part of the LdapAutoSyncToggleDescription key.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Sinxronizasiya bütün məlumatların portaldan yüklənməsinə və parametrlər dəyişdirildikdən sonra yeni məlumatların yenilənməsinə imkan verəcək' is grammatically awkward. The use of the dative case and the phrasing is not the most natural way to express this in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinxronizasiya, portaldakı bütün məlumatları yükləyəcək və parametrlər dəyişdirildikdən sonra yeni məlumatları yeniləyəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'parametrler' translates to 'parameters,' the usage feels slightly formal for this context. A simpler word might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'tənzimləmələr' instead of 'parametrler'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels long and complex, making it less readable. Breaking it into shorter sentences would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Split the first sentence into two: 'Sinxronizasiya bütün məlumatların portaldan yüklənməsinə imkan verir. Parametrler dəyişdirildikdən sonra yeni məlumatların yenilənməsinə də imkan verir.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sinxronizasiya edin' at the end feels overly directive and unnatural. It's more common to offer a suggestion rather than give a direct command.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Sinxronizasiya edin' with 'Sinxronizasiya etməyi unutmayın' (Don't forget to synchronize) or 'Portalda istifadəçilər üçün yeni məlumatınız hər dəfə olduqda sinxronizasiya etməyi tövsiyə edirik' (We recommend synchronizing whenever you have new user data in the portal).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is translated as "Synchronizace probíhá pokaždé, když se na portálu objeví nová data o uživatelích." While understandable, it's less direct and slightly awkward in Czech. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the action of initiating the sync.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizujte pokaždé, když se na portálu objeví nová data o uživatelích.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a passive voice ("Synchronizace probíhá...") which isn't consistent with the English active voice ("Synchronization will allow...").
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to use an active voice for greater consistency, although the passive isn't incorrect.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is translated too literally. It's awkward in German. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of regular synchronization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Synchronisierung sollte jedes Mal durchgeführt werden, wenn sich Benutzerdaten im Portal ändern.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Synchronisieren Sie jedes Mal, wenn Sie neue Daten über Benutzer im Portal haben' is a command, but the preceding sentence is declarative. This creates an inconsistency in tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ändern Sie den Satz 'Synchronisieren Sie jedes Mal, wenn Sie neue Daten über Benutzer im Portal haben' in einen deklarativen Satz, um die Konsistenz zu gewährleisten. Zum Beispiel: 'Führen Sie die Synchronisierung immer dann durch, wenn sich Benutzerdaten im Portal ändern.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly informal tone with the phrase 'Κάντε συγχρονισμό'. A more formal phrasing would be more appropriate for technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εκτελέστε συγχρονισμό (Execute synchronization) or Συγχρονίστε (Synchronize)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Synkronoi aina, kun sinulla on portaalissa uutta tietoa käyttäjistä' feels slightly abrupt. It might be more natural to soften the tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synkronoi aina kun sinulla on uutta tietoa käyttäjistä portaalissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is translated as 'Synchronisez chaque fois que vous avez de nouvelles données sur les utilisateurs dans l’espace.' While understandable, 'espace' (space) isn't the best fit for 'portal'. A more accurate translation would be 'portail' or a more descriptive term like 'plateforme'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronisez chaque fois que vous avez de nouvelles données sur les utilisateurs dans le portail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation, while grammatically correct, could benefit from a slight adjustment to flow more naturally. The repetition of 'données' feels a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La synchronisation permet de télécharger toutes les données du portail et de mettre à jour les informations après avoir modifié les paramètres. Synchronisez chaque fois que vous avez de nouvelles données sur les utilisateurs dans le portail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Սինխրոնիզացրեք' which is an imperative form. While not incorrect, it could be slightly softened to a more descriptive tone to match the original English. Consider a more informative phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrasing like 'Միշտ համապարակեք, երբ պորտալում օգտատերերի մասին նոր տվյալներ ունեք' (Always synchronize when you have new data about users in the portal)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately reflected in the Japanese translation. The Japanese reads more like "Synchronize every time new user data exists in the portal," which is slightly different in nuance.  A better translation would focus on the *action* of syncing when new data is present.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同期により、ポータルからすべてのデータをアップロードし、設定変更後に新しいデータを更新することができます。ポータルのユーザーデータに変更があるたびに同期してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "ポータル (portal)" can be improved for readability.  While not strictly incorrect, it can be slightly clunky in Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同期により、ポータルからすべてのデータをアップロードし、設定変更後に新しいデータを更新することができます。ポータル側のユーザーデータに変更があるたびに同期してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "동기화를 통해 포털에서 모든 데이터를 업로드하고 설정을 변경한 후 새 데이터를 업데이트할 수 있습니다." is a bit long and complex for Korean. It could be broken down for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 동기화를 통해 포털의 모든 데이터를 업로드하고, 설정을 변경한 후에는 새로운 데이터를 업데이트할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is translated literally but loses some nuance. It doesn't clearly convey the intention of regular syncing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 포털 사용자 데이터가 변경될 때마다 동기화하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is too literal and reads awkwardly in Lao. The meaning of synchronization is not fully conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຊື່ອມໂອ້ານຈະຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ສາມາດອັບໂຫຼດຂໍ້ມູນທັງໝົດຈາກເວັບໄຊ້ ແລະປັບປ່ຽນຂໍ້ມູນໃໝ່ຫຼັງຈາກປ່ຽນການຕັ້ງຄ່າໄດ້ ຄວນເຊື່ອມໂອ້ານເປັນໄລຍະເພື່ອໃຫ້ຂໍ້ມູນຖືກຕ້ອງຕາມເວລາ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ" (always) is too strong. It implies constant synchronization, which might not be the intention. It could be misinterpreted as needing to sync every second.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove "ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ" and replace with a more appropriate phrase indicating periodic synchronization.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Sinhronizējiet katru reizi, kad portālā ir jauni dati par lietotājiem" feels slightly abrupt. While grammatically correct, it lacks the flow of the English 'Sync every time...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhronizējiet katru reizi, kad portālā parādās jauni dati par lietotājiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is awkwardly translated. 'on users in the portal' is unclear. It should be more specific about the data being synchronized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchroniseer telkens wanneer u nieuwe gebruikersgegevens in het portaal heeft.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portaal' appears twice. While not technically incorrect, it could be smoother to rephrase to avoid repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchroniseer telkens wanneer u nieuwe gebruikersgegevens in het portaal of in de database heeft.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'nowych danych po zmianie ustawień' is grammatically awkward. It implies updating *new* data after changing settings, which isn't the intended meaning. It should describe updating the portal data based on new settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizacja umożliwia przesyłanie wszystkich danych z portalu i aktualizację danych po zmianie ustawień.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'na temat użytkowników w portalu' is a literal translation of 'on users in the portal' and sounds unnatural in Polish. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'dotyczących użytkowników'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizuj za każdym razem, gdy masz nowe dane dotyczące użytkowników w portalu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is awkwardly translated. The English implies a regular synchronization when new user data is available. The Portuguese 'Sincronize sempre que tiver novos dados de usuários no portal' is a more literal translation, but loses some nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A sincronização permitirá fazer upload de todos os dados do portal e atualizar os novos dados após alterar as configurações. Sincronize sempre que houver novos dados de usuários no portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not accurately reflected in the Portuguese translation.  'on users' doesn't directly translate and implies a location. A more accurate phrasing would focus on the data itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A sincronização permitirá fazer upload de todos os dados do portal e atualizar os novos dados após alterar as configurações. Sincronize sempre que houver novos dados de usuários no portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sincronize sempre que tiver novos dados de usuários no portal' uses the verb 'ter' (to have) when 'houver' (there being) would be more appropriate and grammatically correct in this context to indicate the existence of new user data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronize sempre que houver novos dados de usuários no portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Realizarea sincronizării este necesară de fiecare dată" is too formal and doesn't accurately convey the original meaning of "Sync every time". A more natural Romanian phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Actualizați datele de fiecare dată când adăugați utilizatori noi în portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'încărcarea' (uploading) and 'actualizarea' (updating) are used sequentially, but the meaning is slightly awkward. The original English uses 'Synchronization' which implies both.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea permite actualizarea datelor de pe portalul și adăugarea datelor noi după modificarea setărilor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little disjointed. Combining the first two sentences might improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea permite încărcarea și actualizarea datelor de pe portal, asigurându-vă că datele reflectă modificările de setări. Actualizați datele de fiecare dată când adăugați utilizatori noi în portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetitive phrasing - the sentence 'Synchronization will allow to upload all the data from the portal and update the new data after changing the settings' is repeated in both English and Russian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the Russian translation to avoid repetition. For example: 'Синхронизация позволит загрузить все данные с портала и обновить их после изменения настроек. Синхронизируйте каждый раз, когда у вас появляются новые данные о пользователях на портале.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is translated as "ද්වාරයෙහි පරිශීලකයින් පිළිබඳ නව දත්ත ඇති සෑම අවස්ථාවකම සමමුහුර්ත කරන්න". A more accurate translation would convey the sense of synchronization occurring periodically or when necessary, rather than literally 'every time'. The current translation is overly literal and might imply unnecessary frequent synchronizations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමමුහුර්තකරණය අවශ්‍ය සෑම අවස්ථාවකම කරන්න. (Samamuhurthakaranya avashya samaya avashya karma.) - Synchronize whenever necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses Sinhalese script, which is correct. However, ensuring consistent script usage and proper punctuation within the larger application interface is crucial.  This is beyond the scope of this verification, but a consideration for overall UI/UX.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A - Recommend broader UI/UX review

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is translated literally as "Synchronizujte vždy, keď máte na portáli nové údaje o používateľoch." While technically correct, it's somewhat clunky in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the recurring nature of the synchronization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizujte vždy, keď sú na portáli nové údaje o používateľoch, alebo po zmene nastavení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses sentence fragments. The Slovak translation follows the same structure. This may be less formal than preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring for a smoother flow in Slovak. E.g., 'Synchronizácia umožní nahrať všetky údaje z portálu a aktualizovať nové údaje po zmene nastavení. Pravidelne synchronizujte, keď máte nové údaje o používateľoch na portáli.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Sinhroniziraj vsakič, ko so na voljo novi podatki o uporabnikih na portalu' could be improved for flow. 'So na voljo' is grammatically correct but sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhroniziraj vsakič, ko so na voljo novi uporabniški podatki na portalu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Синхронизујте сваки пут када имате нове податке о корисницима на порталу.' could be improved for flow. It's a bit abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронизујте сваки пут када имате нове информације о корисницима на порталу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses 'data'. While 'податке' (podatke) is a valid translation, 'информације' (informacije) might be more natural and accessible in this context, especially for a less technical audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'податке' with 'информације' throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ayarlar değiştirildikten sonra' is slightly awkward. It could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ayarlar değiştirildikten sonra yeni verilerin güncellenmesini sağlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Portaldaki kullanıcılara ilişkin her yeni veriye sahip olduğunuzda senkronizasyon yapın.' is a bit formal and could be simplified for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Portaldaki kullanıcılarınızda yeni veriler olduğunda senkronizasyon yapın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The entire translation is a single long sentence. Splitting it into shorter sentences would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Senkronizasyon, portaldan tüm verilerin yüklenmesine ve ayarlar değiştirildikten sonra yeni verilerin güncellenmesini sağlar. Portaldaki kullanıcılarınızda yeni veriler olduğunda senkronizasyon yapın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not fully captured by "Синхронізація відбувається кожен раз, коли є нові дані щодо користувачів на порталі.". It implies an automatic process and a suggestion for the user to manually trigger it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронізація відбувається автоматично щоразу, коли з'являються нові дані щодо користувачів на порталі.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetition of 'Synchronization' makes the translation sound less natural. While technically correct, it's repetitive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронізація дозволить передати всі дані з порталу та оновити нові дані після зміни параметрів. Автоматична синхронізація відбувається щоразу, коли з'являються нові дані щодо користувачів на порталі.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not accurately translated. 'On users' is awkward in Vietnamese and 'in the portal' is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đồng bộ hóa mỗi khi bạn có dữ liệu người dùng mới trong cổng thông tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetitive use of 'Đồng bộ hóa' can be improved for better readability.  While technically correct, it reads slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đồng bộ sẽ cho phép tải lên tất cả dữ liệu từ cổng thông tin và cập nhật dữ liệu mới sau khi thay đổi cài đặt. Hãy đồng bộ khi có dữ liệu người dùng mới.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not accurately conveyed by '每次门户中有新用户数据时都将进行同步'.  It's a bit clunky and doesn't capture the immediacy or necessity implied by the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同步每次在门户中有新的用户数据，或在您更改设置后。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation lacks a more natural flow and sentence structure. It's somewhat literal and doesn't read as smoothly as it could.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同步功能可以上传门户中的所有数据，并在更改设置后更新数据。 每次门户有新的用户数据时，建议同步。
